articles.content: The biggest barrier to widespread adoption of phones with these new designs is their high price. Samsung's first foldable phone launched in 2019 for $1,980. Last year's Z Flip cost $1,380, and Micros… [+2920 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft adds Teams 'task publishing' for front-line workers - ARNnet

articles.content: Office workers may be an obvious target audience for Microsoft Teams, but elements of the collaboration platform have also been tailored for front-line employees, such as retail workers, field techni… [+2943 chars]
